snippet.title: World In Danger - Main Trailer IGF Version
snippet.description:
The trailer for Coltgames' latest and upcoming video game release World In Danger.

This trailer was made for our entry into the 2017 Indie Game Festival

More information: http://worldindanger.coltgames.com
